title: Delicious goats cheese and sundried tomato tarts
ingredients: ['olive oil', '2 onions, finely sliced', '3 garlic cloves, diced', 'fresh or dried thyme', '3 tablespoons dry white wine', '2 puff pastry sheets', '200g sundried tomatoes', '200g goats cheese', 'handful basil leaves', 'salt and pepper to taste']
